verbs.description: [ARG0: six flags’ 30-hour coffin challenge] [V: invites] [ARG1: thrill - seekers] [ARGM-PRP: to compete for cash six flags] magic mountain is hosting a special halloween event during which six participants compete for 300 and season passes to the park — all they have to do is lay in a wooden coffin for 30 hours steve kuzj reports for the ktla 5 news at 10 on oct 12 2018 six flags 30-hour
